Additionally, the paragraph mentions that plasma caffeine levels were significantly correlated with these symptoms in the patients, which implies that the disease or disorder may be related to caffeine consumption. Therefore, both the symptoms and plasma caffeine levels can be considered "Disease" entities in this paragraph.
